forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. High near 10C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this morning, becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. High 52F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 8C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 48F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 43F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High around 50F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
